meanings.definition: A type of Brazilian rum made from sugarcane juice.
meanings.sent1: I tried a sip of cachacas at the party.
meanings.sent2: The bartender recommended trying cachacas in a caipirinha cocktail.
meanings.sent3: The cachacas in the punch made everyone dance like they were in Rio!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cachacas filled the room, transporting me to a tropical beach.
meanings.sent5: The taste of cachacas lingered on my tongue, sweet and smooth.

meanings.sent1: The store had various brands of cachacas on sale.
meanings.sent2: We bought two bottles of cachacas for the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The cachacas lined up on the shelf looked like a colorful army.
meanings.sent4: The sound of clinking cachacas bottles signaled the start of the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The labels on the cachacas bottles were vibrant and eye-catching.
